美联储希望通过将医疗保险付款与治疗统计挂钩来减少败血症死亡人数唐·史密斯 (Don Smith) 还记得他在重症监护室里因药物昏迷 13 天后醒来的那一刻。他的妻子和女儿守在他的床边，他以为自己因脚痛来到急诊室才一天。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Feds-hope-to-cut-sepsis-deaths-by-hitching-Medicare- payments-to-treatment-stats.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Feds-hope-to-cut-sepsis-deaths-by-hitching-Medicare- payments-to-treatment-stats.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a1a3b443-b25c-469c-83dc-9da0cadc85da Wed, 11 Oct 2023 08:22:52 -0400 Feds hope to cut sepsis deaths by hitching Medicare payments to treatment stats

PacBio 宣布用于人类全基因组测序数据分析的完整计算工作流程PacBio（纳斯达克股票代码：PACB）是高质量、高精度测序解决方案的领先开发商，今天宣布推出 PacBio WGS Variant Pipeline，这是一种用于 HiFi 全基因组测序 (WGS) 数据分析的完整、标准化计算方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/PacBio-Announces-Complete-Computational-Workflow-for-Human-Whole-Genome-Sequencing-Data-Analysis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/PacBio-Announces-Complete-Computational-Workflow-for-Human-Whole-Genome-Sequencing-Data-Analysis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f8e996a-d520-468a-8bf5-e1b06402091f Wed, 11 Oct 2023 08:03:00 -0400
